Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI

Class Playable_View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI.Playable_View
public class Playable_View extends Object
Class for the representation of player's playable board. Part of Game_View.
